meanings.definition: A type of plastic material made from cellulose nitrate or cellulose acetate.
meanings.sent1: The artist used celluloids to create colorful jewelry.
meanings.sent2: The factory produced various products using celluloids.
meanings.sent3: The kids were amazed by the shiny celluloids used in their toys.
meanings.sent4: The celluloids gleamed under the bright lights of the exhibit.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh celluloids filled the workshop.

meanings.sent1: The director carefully edited the celluloids for the movie.
meanings.sent2: Audiences enjoyed watching the celluloids at the cinema.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed fascinated by the moving celluloids on the screen.
meanings.sent4: The celluloids captured the essence of the story beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The old projector clicked as it played the celluloids.
